name: Little Red Fox
description:
A little game I made in less then a week because I was board. The sound FXs I didn't make and I found on Youtube. The music I didn't make as well. Hope you all like it!

PS: Play the game with headphones for the best experience!

LAG? If it's lagging in the browser try downloading it. Its runs a 100% better that way.

There are a few easter eggs hidden ;)

The audio on the windows download version may be a bit gliched. IDK how to fix that.
